titleStmt.title: Mr. Pym, his speech in Parliament, on Saturday the 19th of February concerning the passing of the bill in the Commons House, for the present pressing of 15000 men, to be immediately transported for Ireland. Which bill was that evening sent up to the Lords for their assent, and was by them also consented unto, and passed accordingly.
titleStmt.author: Pym, John, 1584-1643.

notesStmt.note: In the imprint, the "ondo" in "London" has failed to print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
